title: Asset History Tracker Pro
description: Easily track and manage recently opened assets with Asset History Tracker Pro, an essential Unreal Engine editor plugin designed to optimize your workflow and enhance productivity.
longDescription:
📃Documentation


Asset History Tracker Pro is a practical and user-friendly plugin for Unreal Engine, designed to help developers efficiently track and manage their recently opened assets, including blueprints, textures, and string tables. This plugin records the history of these resources, providing quick access without the need for tedious searching within the editor.


With customizable display options, you can group specific types of resources according to your workflow, allowing for efficient organization and browsing of assets. This significantly enhances workflow efficiency, saving valuable development time.


The plugin supports Unreal Engine versions 4.25 to 4.27. Due to Unreal Marketplace restrictions, which only allow the latest three engine versions for the Code Plugin category, uploading the plugin is not feasible at this time.


To acquire the UE4.25-4.27 version of the plugin, kindly make a purchase on the Unreal Marketplace. After completing your purchase, send an email to "xgames2008@outlook.com" along with your order ID, and we will promptly provide you with the plugin package. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Comprehensive Asset History: Effortlessly saves a complete history of recently accessed assets.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Provides quick and easy access to your assets, enhancing productivity.
  • Optimized Workflow: Eliminates the need for repetitive asset searches, improving workflow efficiency.
  • Customizable Display: Group specific types of resources to match your workflow for better organization.

Code Modules:

  •   Asset History Tracker(Editor)

Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 3

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Win64

Supported Target Build Platforms: Development Editor

Documentation: Documentation
